    • About Amy Wengerd


    Itâs quite simple. You deserve the unexpected extras and unparalleled service my team provides. Whether buying or selling, I will ensure that not only your needs are met but that your expectations are blown away. My team employs a high tech yet hands on approach with each and every one of our clients. As a valued client, you will become part of my real estate family and experience the difference from the very first meeting. Not only that, but that the process is enjoyable along the way!
